#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n;
    long int sum=0,sum2=0,m;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        sum=(n*(n+1))/2;
        for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++)
        {
            cin>>m;
            sum2=sum2+m;
        }
        cout<<(sum-sum2)<<"\n";
        sum2=0;
    }
    return 0;
}
